 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְוֵן‎</span>, &lt; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְרָן‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְוֵנֵה‎</span> **proper name, of a location** ==Syene, city on southern border of Egypt, toward Ethiopia==, only in phrase (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעַדגְּֿבוּל כּוּשׁ‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִמִּגְדֹּל ס‎</span> [[Ezek.29.10|Ezek 29:10]] compare [[Ezek.30.6|Ezek 30:6]], read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְוֵ֫נָה‎</span> or &lt; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְוָ֫נָה‎</span> (Coptic <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***Suan***</u></abbr>), with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ה‎</span> locative ([[BDB#JDMich|JDMich]] [[BDB#Sm|Sm]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]]) = Egyptian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***Sun***</u></abbr>, Coptic ***Suan***, modern <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***Aswân***; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἔως</span> <span class="bdbLangGreek">Συηνης</span>; read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְוָן‎</span> also [[Ezek.30.16|Ezek 30:16]] (for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִין‎</span> q. v.) [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Συηνη</span>. — See further [[BDB#Jos|Jos]]<sup>BJ «JOSEPHUS:Wars of the Jews 4:10»iv. 10</sup>, 5 Strabo<sup>xxxii.817-820,</sup> Brugsch<sup>Geogr. Inscr. i. 155; Reiseber. aus Aegypt. 247</sup> [[BDB#Bäd|Bd]]<sup>Egypt.4.323f.</sup> Budge<sup>Nile 284</sup>.
